channel.title: Jina AI
channel.description: The official newsroom of Jina AI

item.title: Jina ColBERT v2: Multilingual Late Interaction Retriever for Embedding and Reranking
item.description: Jina ColBERT v2 supports 89 languages with superior retrieval performance, user-controlled output dimensions, and 8192 token-length.
item.dc:creator: Jina AI

item.title: The What and Why of Text-Image Modality Gap in CLIP Models
item.description: You can't just use a CLIP model to retrieve text and images and sort the results by score. Why? Because of the modality gap. What is it, and where does it come from?
item.dc:creator: Bo Wang

item.title: Late Chunking in Long-Context Embedding Models
item.description: Chunking long documents while preserving contextual information is challenging. We introduce the "Late Chunking" that leverages long-context embedding models to generate contextual chunk embeddings for better retrieval applications.
item.dc:creator: Michael Günther

item.title: By Hoovering Up the Web, AI Is Poisoning Itself
item.description: What does it mean for LLMs when the web has been strip-mined clean, content providers have locked their doors, and there’s barely a trickle of new data to scrape?
item.dc:creator: Alex C-G

item.title: What We Learned at ICML2024 ft. PLaG, XRM, tinyBenchmark, MagicLens, Prompt Sketching etc.
item.description: We had a blast at ICML 2024 in Vienna, and we want to share with you everything we said, saw, and learned.
item.dc:creator: Florian Hönicke

item.title: Rephrased Labels Improve Zero-Shot Text Classification by 30%
item.description: When using embedding models for zero-shot classification, rephrasing the class label to "This is seriously about 'LABEL'" gives higher accuracy vs. using LABEL alone. But how, and why?
item.dc:creator: Han Xiao

item.title: Can Embedding/Reranker Models Compare Numbers?
item.description: A lot of LLMs can't figure out that 9.11 is actually smaller than 9.9. Can our embedding and reranker models do any better?
item.dc:creator: Han Xiao

item.title: Is Romance Generative AI's Killer App? We Hope Not
item.description: Are AI boyfriends and girlfriends GenAI's killer app? AI romance is no Jane Austen novel, but "social chatbots" are one of the few generative AI businesses with a clear path to profit. Take an up-close and personal look with us.
item.dc:creator: Scott Martens

item.title: No. You Can't Use Reranker to Improve SEO
item.description: But if you work in SEO, it could be interesting to see things from the other side of the table; understand how embeddings and rerankers play their roles in modern search systems.
item.dc:creator: Han Xiao

item.title: Handcrafting Image Prompts Is Dead: Reverse Engineer Midjourney-style Images with PromptPerfect
item.description: From Punk Einstein to Turbo Pigeons: Use PromptPerfect Interactive to reverse engineer prompts from pictures and generate Midjourney-style images with real-time feedback.
item.dc:creator: Alex C-G

item.title: Jina Reranker v2 for Agentic RAG: Ultra-Fast, Multilingual, Function-Calling & Code Search
item.description: Jina Reranker v2 is the best-in-class reranker built for Agentic RAG. It features function-calling support, multilingual retrieval for over 100 languages, code search capabilities, and offers a 6x speedup over v1.
item.dc:creator: Saahil Ognawala

item.title: AI Explainability Made Easy: How Late Interaction Makes Jina-ColBERT Transparent
item.description: AI explainability and transparency are hot topics. How can we trust AI if we can't see how it works? Jina-ColBERT shows you how, with the right model architecture, you can easily make your AI spill its secrets.
item.dc:creator: Maximilian Werk

item.title: Jina CLIP v1: A Truly Multimodal Embeddings Model for Text and Image
item.description: Jina AI's new multimodal embedding model not only outperforms OpenAI CLIP in text-image retrieval, it's a solid image embedding model and state-of-the-art text embedding model at the same time. You don't need different models for different modalities any more.
item.dc:creator: Sofia Vasileva

item.title: Implementing a Chat History RAG with Jina AI and Milvus Lite
item.description: Enhance your search applications in Python with Jina Embeddings and Reranker and lightweight, easy-to-deploy Milvus Lite.
item.dc:creator: Francesco Kruk

item.title: RAG is Dead, Again?
item.description: RAG is just one algorithmic pattern you can use. But if you make it *the* algorithm and idolize it, then you are living in a bubble you created, and the bubble will burst.
item.dc:creator: Han Xiao
